item.title: [Golang] Golang 101 入門筆記
item.description: Hello Go! package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("hello, go!") }$ go run hello.go Hello Go! 基本結構、定義變數 常數 const Pi = 3.14159 const Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday = 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 const ( Unknown = 0 Female = 1 Male = 2 ) // "iota" 變數 var a int var b bool var str string var a int = 15 var i = 5 var b bool = false var str string = "Hello Go!
